channel.title: Vision Care on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Vision Care on 0x000216

item.title: Acuvue by Johnson & Johnson excels in tests conducted in Japan
item.description: Johnson & Johnson Vision Care’s 1-Day Acuvue Define and Acuvue 2 Define contact lenses were favorably mentioned in a report by Japan’s National Consumer Affairs Center (NCAC) concerning popular colored and limbal ring contact lenses in the Asia Pacific region. The NCAC report, “Safety of Color Contact Lenses,” highlighted that while some manufacturers falsely claimed their lenses had “no pigment on the surface,” 1-Day Acuvue Define and Acuvue 2 Define lenses genuinely lacked surface pigments.
